Title: Authorizes the city of New York to provide for certain residential parking permit systems
Summary: Authorizes the city of New York to provide for certain residential parking permit systems in certain neighborhoods, including but not limited to, Washington Heights, Harlem, Morningside Heights, Upper West Side, East Harlem, and Upper East Side.
LawCode: Add ยง1640-s, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing certain residential parking permit systems in the city of New York; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
